Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to service retirement benefits for members of the New York city fire department pension fund, the New York city police pension fund and the New York city employees' retirement system
Summary: Relates to not reducing certain service retirement benefits for members of the New York city fire department pension fund, the New York city police pension fund and the New York city employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service retirement benefits for members of the New York city fire department pension fund, the New York city police pension fund and the New York city employees' retirement system
